markdownRemark.html: One of the most exciting parts about working with JavaScript and front-end development is the fast-paced nature of the industry. New patterns and standards evolve over time. However, keeping up with the changes can be complex and time-consuming because they may involve large-scale changes or refactors that are a bit more involved than a simple find-and-replace. Fortunately, codemods are a handy tool that help us automate these refactors. In this article, Iâ€™ll share more about codemods, walk through a simple codemod that I wrote, and share some tips for debugging.

frontmatter.title: Getting Started with Codemods in JavaScript
